title: WHIRLING F2 / CUNO WAKEUP
description: If you didn't make the authority check.

dialogueTree.title: Cuno: "You see the shape of a prepubescent..."
dialogueTree.text: You see the shape of a prepubescent boy in FALN pants. It turns double -- then triple -- from the pain. He says:

links.title: Cuno: ""Coinslot's dead.""
links.text: "Coinslot's dead."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You can barely hear him, the pain i..."
links.text: You can barely hear him, the pain is so bad.

links.title: You: ""I'm in pain, what... happened?""
links.text: "I'm in pain, what... happened?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno just told you your friend is..."
links.text: "Cuno just told you your friend is dead! And you're crying about pain? That doesn't seem right to Cuno." He shakes his head. "The binoclard was alright, he didn't deserve that shit..."

links.title: Empathy: "Wow... the kid's name must be Cuno...."
links.text: Wow... the kid's name must be Cuno. And he's about to take pity on you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Nah, Cuno's just lying to you. The..."
links.text: "Nah, Cuno's just lying to you. The fucking boo-boo wagon took four-eyes away. He's probably gonna live."

links.title: Empathy: "Wow... Cuno's about to take pity on..."
links.text: Wow... Cuno's about to take pity on you. That's unexpected.

links.title: You: ""Wait... what?""
links.text: "Wait... what?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Just kidding, piggo," he chuckles...."
links.text: "Just kidding, piggo," he chuckles. "The boo-boo wagon took the binoclard away. He's probably gonna live."

links.title: You: ""The what? Where did they take him?""
links.text: "The what? Where did they take him?"

links.title: Cuno: ""To the hospital, fucktard. Try to..."
links.text: "To the hospital, fucktard. Try to keep up with Cuno." He glares at you with something akin to respect...

links.title: Volition: "Thank god, okay, he's alive."
links.text: Thank god, okay, he's alive.

links.title: Cuno: ""They say you burned half the city..."
links.text: "They say you burned half the city down. Thousands dead. That's very cool to Cuno. I thought I'd stick around."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's saying *I* now? And not callin..."
links.text: He's saying *I* now? And not calling you a f****t or a pig? Is he ill or something?

links.title: You: ""Hold on... There's something diffe..."
links.text: "Hold on... There's something different about you, Cuno..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Nah... Cuno's just off speed for a..."
links.text: "Nah... Cuno's just off speed for a few days..." There's a melancholy look in his eyes.

links.title: Cuno: ""Being off speed makes Cuno sad. Ma..."
links.text: "Being off speed makes Cuno sad. Makes Cuno *think* about shit." He makes vague gestures around his head with his fingers.

links.title: You: ""Go away, Cuno... Let me die in pea..."
links.text: "Go away, Cuno... Let me die in peace."

links.title: Cuno: ""Now's not the time to shit the bed..."
links.text: "Now's not the time to shit the bed, pig." He spits. "C'mon, baconman, Cuno's gonna help you hold your shit in."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Sounds like he's alright after all."
links.text: Sounds like he's alright after all.

links.title: You: ""Be straight with me. I need to get..."
links.text: "Be straight with me. I need to get my bearings."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure, Cuno's gonna help you with t..."
links.text: "Sure, Cuno's gonna help you with that. Cuno's in a *giving* mood right now."

links.title: You: ""Didn't you say you and I were done..."
links.text: "Didn't you say you and I were done. Professionally?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Don't get all hung up on that yest..."
links.text: "Don't get all hung up on that yesterday's shit, piggo," the kid says, trying to sound mature. "That was then, this is now. Cuno's all about being in the moment."

links.title: Composure: "The kid really doesn't seem to harb..."
links.text: The kid really doesn't seem to harbour any animosity towards you. He seems almost friendly.

links.title: You: ""Wait, but *why* do you forgive me?"
links.text: "Wait, but *why* do you forgive me?

links.title: Cuno: ""Listen-listen, Cuno's just big lik..."
links.text: "Listen-listen, Cuno's just big like that. Doesn't need that bitch-ass melodrama. Cuno fires and forgets. Cuno forgives and moves on."

links.title: Empathy: "He doesn't have anyone in the world..."
links.text: He doesn't have anyone in the world.

links.title: You: ""We're cool, Cuno,""
links.text: "We're cool, Cuno,"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, that's what Cuno's fuckin' s..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's what Cuno's fuckin' saying, piggo. He's letting you off the hook." He rests his hands on his hips and looks you in the eye. "A one time boon, from Cunn to pig. There won't be a next one."

links.title: You: ""So we're cool now?""
links.text: "So we're cool now?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, Cuno's letting you off the h..."
links.text: "Yeah, Cuno's letting you off the hook, piggo." He rests his hands on his hips and looks you straight in the eye. "It's a one time boon, from Cunn to pig. The next time you're a dead man."

links.title: Drama: "Sire, the boy believes this to be t..."
links.text: Sire, the boy believes this to be true. He's giving you a last chance.

links.title: You: ""You said thousands are dead?""
links.text: "You said thousands are dead?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, it was a fucking massacre,"..."
links.text: "Yeah, it was a fucking massacre," Cuno says with a wide grin. "You and Cuno are the only ones left here."

links.title: Volition: "Relax, the kid is just messing with..."
links.text: Relax, the kid is just messing with you. You didn't actually get *thousands* of people killed.

links.title: Logic: "There were only ten people present..."
links.text: There were only ten people present at the fight. Ten times more than that is very unlikely.

links.title: You: ""What happened to me?""
links.text: "What happened to me?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You tore some shit up there, pig."..."
links.text: "You tore some shit up there, pig." Cuno is looking at you like a tamed wolf would look at his master. Like an equal. "Got shot too."

links.title: You: ""How badly am I hurt?""
links.text: "How badly am I hurt?"

links.title: Cuno: ""How would Cuno know? Cuno's not a..."
links.text: "How would Cuno know? Cuno's not a fucking doctor." He looks at you like you're an idiot.

links.title: Cuno: "Then his expression mellows. "Cuno..."
links.text: Then his expression mellows. "Cuno thinks you got shot twice. In the shoulder and in the leg. The leg's pretty fucking nasty, but a doctor looked you over and took the bullet out."

links.title: Cuno: ""The shoulder's fine, probably... T..."
links.text: "The shoulder's fine, probably... The doc didn't seem too worried about it -- said the bullet went right through."

links.title: Logic: "The bullet must have passed through..."
links.text: The bullet must have passed through your shoulder blade, missing your lung and your heart. You lucky son of a bitch...

links.title: You: ""Can I... walk?""
links.text: "Can I... walk?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Are your legs attached to Cuno? Ca..."
links.text: "Are your legs attached to Cuno? Can the *Cuno* move your legs? The fuck should I know..."

links.title: Endurance: "With considerable pain, and a stitc..."
links.text: With considerable pain, and a stitch tearing every now and then, you should be able to do it.

links.title: You: ""I'm a psycholocomotor, Cuno.""
links.text: "I'm a psycholocomotor, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno lets out a whistle. "That's pr..."
links.text: Cuno lets out a whistle. "That's pretty cool to Cuno. Cuno's also a psycho."

links.title: You: ""Has anyone from my station been to..."
links.text: "Has anyone from my station been to see me?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You keep asking all this *weird sh..."
links.text: "You keep asking all this *weird shit* from Cuno that the Cuno has no way of knowing about."

links.title: You: ""Do you know who treated me, Cuno?""
links.text: "Do you know who treated me, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno did.""
links.text: "Cuno did."

links.title: Logic: "He didn't."
links.text: He didn't.

links.title: You: ""Thanks, Cuno, you're a life saver.""
links.text: "Thanks, Cuno, you're a life saver."

links.title: Cuno: ""It's cool." He nods seriously. "Ju..."
links.text: "It's cool." He nods seriously. "Just remember -- Cuno doesn't save shit for free."

links.title: You: ""You said there was a doctor who re..."
links.text: "You said there was a doctor who removed the bullet from my leg."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah... Some cunt from your statio..."
links.text: "Yeah... Some cunt from your station came over and knife fucked you, when you were sleeping."

links.title: Cuno: ""Nix Fucklieb, I think he was calle..."
links.text: "Nix Fucklieb, I think he was called," he says trying to remember the situation. "Said he was a doctor. Then fucked off and told me to phone him if you shit yourself."

links.title: You: ""C'mon, man... who *really* did it?""
links.text: "C'mon, man... who *really* did it?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Some doctor your pig friends sent..."
links.text: "Some doctor your pig friends sent over. Nix Fucklieb, I think. Total cunt." He spits on the ground. "Came in here and knife fucked you, when you where sleeping. Then fucked off and told me to phone him if you shit yourself."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Nix Gottlieb, station medic, throws..."
links.text: Nix Gottlieb, station medic, throws a bag containing a small bullet into the medical waste disposer. Then he pops some caramel candy into his mouth and says: "Next." There's a line behind his door...

links.title: Logic: "If he did triage and left, you must..."
links.text: If he did triage and left, you must be relatively stable.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "We're detecting *drouamine* in your..."
links.text: We're detecting *drouamine* in your bloodstream. It's a potent morphine-based painkiller. The good doctor must have given you some... It's gonna suck when it wears off.

links.title: You: ""Are you hurt?""
links.text: "Are you hurt?"

links.title: Cuno: ""*Why* in the name of fuck would Cu..."
links.text: "*Why* in the name of fuck would Cuno be hurt?" The kid rolls his eyes at you.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's fucking smart, Cuno wasn't..."
links.text: "Cuno's fucking smart, Cuno wasn't *in* that fuck-pile. Cuno knows when shit goes south, unlike you."

links.title: You: "(Get up -- slowly.)"
links.text: (Get up -- slowly.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Go easy, pig. You wanna lean on th..."
links.text: "Go easy, pig. You wanna lean on the Cuno or something?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You can take it. Just don't lean on..."
links.text: You can take it. Just don't lean on the old leg too heavily.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ouch, ouch... The kid turns double..."
links.text: Ouch, ouch... The kid turns double for a second. Damn, that hurts. Breathe...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Your balance is *way* off. You feel..."
links.text: Your balance is *way* off. You feel like you're about to fall over.

links.title: Cuno: ""So how is it?""
links.text: "So how is it?"

links.title: You: ""Gnhhhh...""
links.text: "Gnhhhh..."

links.title: Cuno: "Cuno observes you getting on your f..."
links.text: Cuno observes you getting on your feet and says nothing.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Still, you see something akin to re..."
links.text: Still, you see something akin to respect in his eyes.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Yeah, that kid's taken a beating --..."
links.text: Yeah, that kid's taken a beating -- or ten -- from his dad. He has regard for a man who can walk after taking some damage.

links.title: You: ""My... disco days are done.""
links.text: "My... disco days are done."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah... you got lucky there, pig...."
links.text: "Yeah... you got lucky there, pig. Maybe now Cuno can show you what real brutal hard music is."

links.title: You: ""I feel fantastic. Let's... rock.""
links.text: "I feel fantastic. Let's... rock."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno can see you're trying to shit..."
links.text: "Cuno can see you're trying to shit him, but Cuno's unshittable, so fuck does Cuno care?"

links.title: You: ""Who cares. Who cares about me. It..."
links.text: "Who cares. Who cares about me. It doesn't matter."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno's got zero patience for this..."
links.text: "Cuno's got zero patience for this weepy shit. Cuno's been through way worse than this."

links.title: You: ""I'm very bad, Cuno. Things are ver..."
links.text: "I'm very bad, Cuno. Things are very bad."

links.title: Endurance: "Through tears and blood and stitche..."
links.text: Through tears and blood and stitches tearing it *should* be possible. From time to time...

links.title: Volition: "You can walk. If it's possible, the..."
links.text: You can walk. If it's possible, then by pure willpower alone. You're a psycholocomotor.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You won't be able to dance much, th..."
links.text: You won't be able to dance much, that's for sure. But you should be able to live with limping around. If you can call that a life.

links.title: Cuno: ""Pretty fucking bad, Cuno thinks."..."
links.text: "Pretty fucking bad, Cuno thinks." He points to your left leg. "But you're one lucky pig. The doc took the bullet out and said you'll live."

links.title: Cuno: ""You got shot in the shoulder too,..."
links.text: "You got shot in the shoulder too, but luckily you were wearing that fancy teapot and it took the hit for you."

links.title: Cuno: ""Pretty fucking bad, Cuno thinks."..."
links.text: "Pretty fucking bad, Cuno thinks." He points to your left leg. "But you're one lucky pig. The doc took the bullet out and said you'll live."

links.title: You: ""What happened to my room?""
links.text: "What happened to my room?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Babybeard was in here. Was probabl..."
links.text: "Babybeard was in here. Was probably a *bitch* to clean this shit up..." This seems to please him.

links.title: Logic: "*Babybeard*... that can only be Gar..."
links.text: *Babybeard*... that can only be Garte, the cafeteria manager.

links.title: You: ""You mean Garte?""
links.text: "You mean Garte?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, fuckin' babybeard. Cleaned a..."
links.text: "Yeah, fuckin' babybeard. Cleaned all your shit up. He's like your fuckin' mom now or something."

links.title: You: ""How long was I out?""
links.text: "How long was I out?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Two days," he says indifferently...."
links.text: "Two days," he says indifferently. "Cuno's been out longer, sleepin' off the speed train. Two days is nothing."

links.title: Cuno: "He looks you in the eye and repeats..."
links.text: He looks you in the eye and repeats: "Two days is *nothing* to the Cuno."

links.title: You: ""What happened to the others?""
links.text: "What happened to the others?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Titus died," he says indifferently..."
links.text: "Titus died," he says indifferently. "Some of his goons too. The whole fucking harbour is in lockdown right now. Even Cuno can't get in."

links.title: Logic: "Evrart probably used this armed alt..."
links.text: Evrart probably used this armed altercation as an excuse to completely barricade himself in the harbour and cut off all communications with the outside world.

links.title: You: ""Titus is dead...?""
links.text: "Titus is dead...?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, fuckin' dead. Died in the ho..."
links.text: "Yeah, fuckin' dead. Died in the hospital, I hear. Union's all weepy and shit..." He gives you a nod of acknowledgement: "It's probably your fault."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It probably is... fucking butterfin..."
links.text: It probably is... fucking butterfingers.

links.title: Volition: "It's the *fault* of those who *kill..."
links.text: It's the *fault* of those who *killed* him. Not you.

links.title: You: ""Do you know if Klaasje -- the blon..."
links.text: "Do you know if Klaasje -- the blonde next door -- is alright?"

links.title: Cuno: ""She's gone, pig. Cuno saw her take..."
links.text: "She's gone, pig. Cuno saw her take off before you started all that violent shit. Had a suitcase and shit."

links.title: Drama: "He's telling the truth."
links.text: He's telling the truth.

links.title: Logic: "Doesn't sound like she's planning t..."
links.text: Doesn't sound like she's planning to come back.

links.title: You: ""She escaped?""
links.text: "She escaped?"

links.title: Cuno: ""What?" He studies your expression...."
links.text: "What?" He studies your expression. "You don't believe the Cuno? You don't believe the Cuno knows this shit? Fuck you, Cuno keeps tabs. Bitch is outta town."

links.title: Volition: "Who would have thought? Perhaps you..."
links.text: Who would have thought? Perhaps you should have *arrested* her?

links.title: You: ""Do you know if Klaasje -- the blon..."
links.text: "Do you know if Klaasje -- the blonde next door -- is really gone?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, she's way gone pig. Cuno's b..."
links.text: "Yeah, she's way gone pig. Cuno's been here for two days and babybeard and you are the only fucks in the building."

links.title: Volition: "Of course she's *really* gone, what..."
links.text: Of course she's *really* gone, what did you think.

links.title: You: ""Did Elizabeth -- the gardener -- s..."
links.text: "Did Elizabeth -- the gardener -- survive?"

links.title: Cuno: ""No." The kid suddenly looks very y..."
links.text: "No." The kid suddenly looks very young and small. "She was dead when the Union doctor arrived. Cuno saw them put her in a bag."

links.title: Empathy: "Tough he may be, but this image lef..."
links.text: Tough he may be, but this image left a mark.

links.title: Half Light: "That bag's on *you*. You could have..."
links.text: That bag's on *you*. You could have done something, but you just stood there. Fuck...

links.title: Cuno: ""Was nothin'." He tries to shake of..."
links.text: "Was nothin'." He tries to shake off the image. "Cuno's gonna go into a bag too. We all are."

links.title: You: ""Do you know if Joyce -- the compan..."
links.text: "Do you know if Joyce -- the company lady with the boat -- is alright?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Rich bitch? Yeah, probably. Boat's..."
links.text: "Rich bitch? Yeah, probably. Boat's gone. Cuno'd be fucking *fine* too if Cuno had a boat..."

links.title: You: ""Is Titus alright?""
links.text: "Is Titus alright?"

links.title: Cuno: ""The big fuckhole?" There's a flash..."
links.text: "The big fuckhole?" There's a flash of respect on his freckled face. "Yeah, he's drinking downstairs. Cuno's not into that."

links.title: You: ""The whole harbour is in lockdown?""
links.text: "The whole harbour is in lockdown?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, that's what Cuno said. No on..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's what Cuno said. No one goes in or out. Shit's paranoid now."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for telling me, Cuno." (Con..."
links.text: "Thanks for telling me, Cuno." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""No problem. Cuno shares the info.""
links.text: "No problem. Cuno shares the info."

links.title: Cuno: ""Some of those Union goons got fuck..."
links.text: "Some of those Union goons got fucked," he says pointing at the door. "Now the whole harbour is in lockdown. Even Cuno can't get in there."

links.title: You: ""What do you think I should do now,..."
links.text: "What do you think I should do now, Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""The fuck you askin' Cuno for?" He..."
links.text: "The fuck you askin' Cuno for?" He seems annoyed somehow. "How would Cuno know? Cuno's fucking twelve!"

links.title: You: ""You don't... know?""
links.text: "You don't... know?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Tough shit, pig." He crosses his a..."
links.text: "Tough shit, pig." He crosses his arms. "All Cuno knows is the harbour is in lockdown, town's fucked now. Half the Hardie bitches are dead and even your company bitch left."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's really been keeping tabs -- on..."
links.text: He's really been keeping tabs -- on you, the Hardies, even the company rep.

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno thinks you're fucked," he con..."
links.text: "Cuno thinks you're fucked," he concludes with a solemn nod. "But I can help you. What'cha got? Bounce that shit off Cuno."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "*I* again. Something in him *is* sh..."
links.text: *I* again. Something in him *is* shifting, changing.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Let's do this tango, pig, he thinks..."
links.text: Let's do this tango, pig, he thinks. Detective Pig and detective Cunn on the case. We bouncin'.

links.title: Composure: "Cunn and Pig? And you're picking hi..."
links.text: Cunn and Pig? And you're picking him up on your cop-frequency too. This is... bad.

links.title: You: ""The fucking *May bells*, Cuno, the..."
links.text: "The fucking *May bells*, Cuno, the flowers!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah? What? What bells?""
links.text: "Yeah? What? What bells?"

links.title: You: "(Yank it out and show the dried flo..."
links.text: (Yank it out and show the dried flower, while it falls to pieces.) "This flower, Cuno!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck, pig..." He looks at you with..."
links.text: "Fuck, pig..." He looks at you with a worried glance. "Cuno doesn't know about this flower shit. Cuno's not feelin' it."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's wrong! What does he even know?..."
links.text: He's wrong! What does he even know?!

links.title: You: ""No, Cuno -- *somehow* this *is* co..."
links.text: "No, Cuno -- *somehow* this *is* connected to the case."

links.title: Cuno: ""Sure, pig. Sure." He shakes his he..."
links.text: "Sure, pig. Sure." He shakes his head. "You better have more than some fuckin' roses if you wanna bust this."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit, pig... You better have some..."
links.text: "Shit, pig... You better have some more shit than fuckin' roses or something."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah? What? What bells?""
links.text: "Yeah? What? What bells?"

links.title: You: ""They were on the roof. I did not....."
links.text: "They were on the roof. I did not... I did not catch them. Fucking butterfingers..."

links.title: You: ""There was a hole in Klaasje's wall..."
links.text: "There was a hole in Klaasje's wall -- someone was checking her out. Peeping."

links.title: Cuno: ""Huh?" The kid appears to be thinki..."
links.text: "Huh?" The kid appears to be thinking. "That could've been there for years. Cuno thinks it's a dead end."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, it probably is.""
links.text: "Yeah, it probably is."

links.title: Cuno: ""Walls are full of holes in here, p..."
links.text: "Walls are full of holes in here, pig. Even Cuno knows that."

links.title: Logic: "There is no telling *when* it was m..."
links.text: There is no telling *when* it was made. He had a point there.

links.title: You: ""The fuck Cuno?""
links.text: "The fuck Cuno?"

links.title: Cuno: ""You want Cuno to be your yes-man,..."
links.text: "You want Cuno to be your yes-man, or you want me to tell it like it is? Walls are full of holes here, pig. Even Cuno knows that."

links.title: You: ""There were some footprints in the..."
links.text: "There were some footprints in the dust in the room behind Klaasje's..."

links.title: Cuno: ""There are fuckin' footprints *ever..."
links.text: "There are fuckin' footprints *everywhere*, pig. Pigs are too into this footprints shit..." He shakes his head. "Cuno just saw footprints outside on the *sidewalk*."

links.title: You: ""There's a... 28% possibility the v..."
links.text: "There's a... 28% possibility the victim was shot from a distance."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah that sounds real to Cuno. For..."
links.text: "Yeah that sounds real to Cuno. Forensics-shit. True crime shit." The kid punches his palm. "Let's check out some crime scenes and assess shit. Pig-style! Anything else?"

links.title: Suggestion: "He's genuinely impressed, but that'..."
links.text: He's genuinely impressed, but that's mostly to do with how scientific that percentage sounded.

links.title: You: ""There's something creeping around..."
links.text: "There's something creeping around out there. I sense it."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, like what?" He seems to like..."
links.text: "Yeah, like what?" He seems to like the idea.

links.title: You: ""*Something*.""
links.text: "*Something*."

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit..." He shakes his head, disap..."
links.text: "Shit..." He shakes his head, disappointed. "Playing the Cuno like that... You better have something else for me."

links.title: You: ""Nothing.""
links.text: "Nothing."

links.title: You: ""The miracle hasn't happened yet. I..."
links.text: "The miracle hasn't happened yet. It's not over yet."

links.title: Cuno: ""Miracle? Shit... What is this weak..."
links.text: "Miracle? Shit... What is this weak shit? You gotta watch your own back, miracles don't fuckin' happen in Martinaise. Get real."

links.title: You: ""It's simple, Cuno. I have to find..."
links.text: "It's simple, Cuno. I have to find *communism*. Communism killed the hanged man."

links.title: Cuno: ""Is that like a fucking street name..."
links.text: "Is that like a fucking street name or something?" The kid stops to think. "It's pretty cool to Cuno."

links.title: You: ""The coolest, Cuno. But unfortunate..."
links.text: "The coolest, Cuno. But unfortunately it's an ideology, not a person."

links.title: Cuno: ""C'mon, pig..." The kid snaps his f..."
links.text: "C'mon, pig..." The kid snaps his fingers. "Thoughts didn't kill Cuno's gimp. It was a person. Even Cuno can figure this shit out."

links.title: You: ""Okay.""
links.text: "Okay."

links.title: Cuno: ""So... you're gonna go after this *..."
links.text: "So... you're gonna go after this *Communism*, or you wanna bounce something else off the Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""It's not *that* cool. And it's not..."
links.text: "It's not *that* cool. And it's not a person, but an ideology."

links.title: You: ""Communism is stupid, Cuno. And it'..."
links.text: "Communism is stupid, Cuno. And it's not a person. It's an ideology."

links.title: You: ""I can suddenly see how it's hard t..."
links.text: "I can suddenly see how it's hard to indict someone who is not actually a person, but an ideology..."

links.title: Cuno: ""You're starting to lose the Cuno."..."
links.text: "You're starting to lose the Cuno." He's looking around. "Sounds like you ain't got shit to go by here."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for your help, Cuno." (Conc..."
links.text: "Thanks for your help, Cuno." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Shit ain't nothing to Cuno," he sa..."
links.text: "Shit ain't nothing to Cuno," he says with a nod. "What now?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know but I won't give up,..."
links.text: "I don't know but I won't give up, Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Will-pig." He nods. "You ready to..."
links.text: "Will-pig." He nods. "You ready to walk, will-pig?"

links.title: You: ""I'm giving up. Time to start drink..."
links.text: "I'm giving up. Time to start drinking."

links.title: Cuno: ""Fuck off, Cuno's not into this old..."
links.text: "Fuck off, Cuno's not into this old man piss-drinker shit." There's a short pause as he shakes his head. "You ready to walk now?"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Cuno: ""What, you mute now? Are you *ready..."
links.text: "What, you mute now? Are you *ready to walk*?"

links.title: You: ""But... I don't know either.""
links.text: "But... I don't know either."

links.title: You: ""Relax, Cuno -- I know what to do.""
links.text: "Relax, Cuno -- I know what to do."

links.title: Cuno: ""Oh really?" He doesn't seem to bel..."
links.text: "Oh really?" He doesn't seem to believe you. "You can't get to that fat fuck Evrart anymore, 'cause the harbour's locked down. Half the Hardie bitches are dead and your company bitch sailed off."

links.title: You: ""I'm ready, Cuno." (Conclude.)"
links.text: "I'm ready, Cuno." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cuno: ""So, listen, pig..." The kid seems..."
links.text: "So, listen, pig..." The kid seems hesitant suddenly. "Cuno's been thinkin' about shit and, uh... Cuno's coming with you. Help you wrap this shit up. Final-style."

links.title: Empathy: "Asking for something -- even asking..."
links.text: Asking for something -- even asking to come along -- doesn't come easy for him.

links.title: You: ""What style was that?""
links.text: "What style was that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Final-style," he repeats. "You fuc..."
links.text: "Final-style," he repeats. "You fucked everything up. Now Cuno's all you got. Terminal Cuno."

links.title: You: ""*Why* do you wanna come with me?""
links.text: "*Why* do you wanna come with me?"

links.title: Cuno: ""This scene is dead." He gestures t..."
links.text: "This scene is dead." He gestures towards the window. "Cuno's outta here -- might as well be a pig, big-up fucky-fingers on my way out."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Big-up fucky-fingers? He *is* a *fr..."
links.text: Big-up fucky-fingers? He *is* a *free-thinker*. Beyond the box. Can't argue with that.

links.title: Endurance: "Say what you will, but this kid's *..."
links.text: Say what you will, but this kid's *hard shit*. He might actually make a good cop one day.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Khm... DRUG ASSET DETECTED!"
links.text: Khm... DRUG ASSET DETECTED!

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Kid would make a half-decent sharps..."
links.text: Kid would make a half-decent sharpshooter, no?

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Look at him. Life hasn't been easy..."
links.text: Look at him. Life hasn't been easy on him. You wanna drag him along and put him through more shit? *Your* shit?

links.title: Empathy: "Look, this might be his only way ou..."
links.text: Look, this might be his only way out.

links.title: Authority: "Trying to recruit him is like tryin..."
links.text: Trying to recruit him is like trying to make a pet out of fire. This kid recognizes only one authority -- his own.

links.title: Logic: "He is streetwise. Knows the neighbo..."
links.text: He is streetwise. Knows the neighbourhood. Knows the people. He could be useful.

links.title: Volition: "This is a twelve year old kid. You..."
links.text: This is a twelve year old kid. You can't seriously be considering *taking him along*?! What's gonna happen to him?

links.title: You: ""All right. Saddle up." (Accept the..."
links.text: "All right. Saddle up." (Accept the Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Accepted the Cuno like a motherfuc..."
links.text: "Accepted the Cuno like a motherfucker..." He nods respectfully. "What are we gonna do now?"

links.title: You: ""Now? As to what's going to happen..."
links.text: "Now? As to what's going to happen next..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yes, gimp... ?" Cuno asks, seeing..."
links.text: "Yes, gimp... ?" Cuno asks, seeing the effort it takes you to stand. "What are you gonna do now? Ride outta here on your shit-river? You'll die alone. Cuno doesn't give a shit now. Too late now. Cuno's gonna hang here and *fuck* your room up again..."

links.title: You: "Whatever it takes. [Leave.]"
links.text: Whatever it takes. [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""We should check Klaasje's room.""
links.text: "We should check Klaasje's room."

links.title: Cuno: ""That's Klaasje, right? Bitch next..."
links.text: "That's Klaasje, right? Bitch next door? Cuno's thinking the same thing," he agrees. "Let's rock it, pig-man."

links.title: Cuno: ""Bitch next door? That's what Cuno'..."
links.text: "Bitch next door? That's what Cuno's thinking too," he agrees. "Good call. Let's rock it, pig-man."

links.title: You: ""I don't know. Let's just aimlessly..."
links.text: "I don't know. Let's just aimlessly wander until a clue presents itself."

links.title: Cuno: ""That sounds like a hella shit plan..."
links.text: "That sounds like a hella shit plan. You askin' Cuno to come along to your shit-show and you don't even know what to do? Fuckin' check your pig journal or something. C'mon..."

links.title: You: ""I don't know.""
links.text: "I don't know."

links.title: Cuno: ""You askin' Cuno to come along to y..."
links.text: "You askin' Cuno to come along to your shit-show and you don't even know what to do? Fuckin' check your pig journal or something. C'mon..."

links.title: Logic: "You did mention doing more ballisti..."
links.text: You did mention doing more ballistics...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Also, it's just close enough to end..."
links.text: Also, it's just close enough to endure the walk.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do i..."
links.text: Ballistics. In Klaasje's room. Do it *properly*.

links.title: Shivers: "A gust of wind blows in from the ba..."
links.text: A gust of wind blows in from the bay, the duraluminium box around you vibrates imperceptibly... a familiar cold, a red thread on the roof upstairs. Taut. Plucked like a string by the gust.

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, debrief Cuno. Let Cuno know..."
links.text: "Yeah, debrief Cuno. Let Cuno know *the plan*." The kid rubs his hands together.

links.title: You: ""Sorry, Cuno, I can't take you with..."
links.text: "Sorry, Cuno, I can't take you with me." (Refuse the Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Sorry for what?! For not adding Cu..."
links.text: "Sorry for what?! For not adding Cuno to your shitshow?! Cuno's not sorry. Cuno's glad. I was just kidding too. You couldn't get Cuno for million reál. Fuck you, okay?"

links.title: Empathy: "Wow, he did not take that rejection..."
links.text: Wow, he did not take that rejection well.

links.title: You: ""All right. Saddle up." (Accept the..."
links.text: "All right. Saddle up." (Accept the Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Thanks, pig." He quickly glances a..."
links.text: "Thanks, pig." He quickly glances at you, then looks away. "Now get your crippled ass up and tell Cuno, what are we gonna do now?"

links.title: You: ""Now... as to what's going to happe..."
links.text: "Now... as to what's going to happen next..." (Get up.)

links.title: You: ""Sorry, Cuno, I can't take you with..."
links.text: "Sorry, Cuno, I can't take you with me." (Refuse the Cuno.)

links.title: Cuno: ""Sorry for what?! For not adding Cu..."
links.text: "Sorry for what?! For not adding Cuno to your shitshow?! Cuno's not sorry. Cuno's glad. I was just kidding. You couldn't get Cuno for a million reál. You can't even get out bed, loser."

links.title: Empathy: "Wow, he did not take that rejection..."
links.text: Wow, he did not take that rejection well.

links.title: Cuno: ""They say you shot that fucker in t..."
links.text: "They say you shot that fucker in the face. That's fucking cool to Cuno." He looks down. "So I thought I'd stick around."

links.title: Cuno: ""They say you got a lot of people k..."
links.text: "They say you got a lot of people killed. Like half the town. They say you didn't do shit." He looks down. "I guess that's cool, so I thought I'd stick around."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's not saying Cuno -- he's saying..."
links.text: He's not saying Cuno -- he's saying *I*? And not calling you a f****t or a pig? Is he ill or something?

links.title: You: ""No... no, no...""
links.text: "No... no, no..."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.
